purpose: 7-line runtime guardrail for maintaining hyperfast development velocity during live coding sessions.

card.expansion: Fast run/build cycle; split view code <-> output; friction minimized.
Eliminate/simplify; use framework/config/data before writing custom code.
Define outcome, minimal slice, inputs/outputs, top risks, verification method.
One-screen unit; explicit success criteria; independently verifiable.
Change -> observe quickly; if loop slows, reduce scope or improve tooling.
Simple structure; obvious names; shallow control flow; no clever opacity.
Promote reuse patterns; batch related work; tag temporary hacks; work in bursts.

design_note: This artifact is intentionally compressed. Each line maps to multiple deeper playbook steps. It is meant to stabilize behavior under cognitive load.
